5  std::vector< std::string > GetWindowList() {
6  std::vector< std::string > wl(8);
7 
8  wl[0] = "Bartlett";
9  wl[1] = "Welch";
10  wl[2] = "TukeyHann";
11  wl[3] = "Cs2Hann";

21  BaseWindow* WindowFactory(const std::string& name, unsigned int size) {
22  BaseWindow *w = 0;
23  if (name == "Bartlett") {
24  w = new BartlettWindow(size);
25  } else if (name == "Welch") {
26  w = new WelchWindow(size);
27  } else if (name == "TukeyHann") {
28  w = new TukeyHannWindow(size);
29  } else if (name == "Cs2Hann") {
30  w = new Cs2HannWindow(size);
31  } else if (name == "Cs2Hamming") {
32  w = new Cs2HammingWindow(size);
33  } else if (name == "Bisquare") {
34  w = new BisquareWindow(size);
35  } else if (name == "Tukey") {
36  w = new TukeyWindow(size);
37  } else if (name == "Kaiser") {
38  w = new KaiserWindow(size);
39  }
40  if (w != 0) {
41  LogInfo("Created window %s", name.c_str());
42  } else {
43  LogWarning("Failed to create window %s", name.c_str());
44  }
45  return w;
46  }
47 
48  BaseWindow* WindowFactory(const std::string& name, const std::string& parameters, unsigned int size) {
49  BaseWindow *w = 0;
50  if (name == "Bartlett") {
51  w = new BartlettWindow(size, parameters);
52  } else if (name == "Welch") {
53  w = new WelchWindow(size, parameters);
54  } else if (name == "TukeyHann") {
55  w = new TukeyHannWindow(size, parameters);
56  } else if (name == "Cs2Hann") {
57  w = new Cs2HannWindow(size, parameters);
58  } else if (name == "Cs2Hamming") {
59  w = new Cs2HammingWindow(size, parameters);
60  } else if (name == "Bisquare") {
61  w = new BisquareWindow(size, parameters);
62  } else if (name == "Tukey") {
63  w = new TukeyWindow(size, parameters);
64  } else if (name == "Kaiser") {
65  w = new KaiserWindow(size, parameters);
66  }
67  if (w != 0) {
68  LogInfo("Created window %s with parameters %s", name.c_str(), parameters.c_str());
69  } else {
70  LogWarning("Failed to create window %s with parameters %s", name.c_str(), parameters.c_str());
71  }
72  return w;
73  }
